website_summaries.verdict: A classic silhouette that never goes out of style and a solid choice if you prefer aviator sunglasses and want Ray-Bans at a value price.
pros: Traditional aviator style with durable metal frames
Has polarized lenses, adjustable arms, and falls on the low end of the price range for Ray-Bans
cons: The lenses might be somewhat large on men with smaller faces, and they are a bit heavy

customer_reviews.title: Fake Sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my husband's birthday and we knew they were fake the moment we took them off the case. The glasses were flimsy, and having owned 3 pairs of real Ray-Bans in the past, we know that the quality of these glasses was sub par. It was also obvious to me that they had been used and returned as a prior purchase as the lens were covered in fingerprints, the box they came in was a disaster and the plastic that usually covers the "legs" was laying inside the case rather than protecting them. If I could give this product 0 stars I would.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This might be a used product they are selling
customer_reviews.text: The box was torn, already opened and looked like an old used box. The cleaning cloth inside was used too and the lens were VERY DIRTY!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great price, great quality
customer_reviews.text: I got the all black ones and i absolutely love them. They are half the price of the ones i almost bought at sunglass hut and you can tell they are authentic by the engraved "RB." I think I am going to order another pair!!
customer_reviews.author: Brianna knopf

customer_reviews.title: I am so disappointed to see that the Ray Ban printed on the ...
customer_reviews.text: I am so disappointed to see that the Ray Ban printed on the Glass is chipping out in just a little over one month after I bought it. See the image.
customer_reviews.author: SHEIKH ABDUL RAHMAN

customer_reviews.title: Quality, fit and appearance is worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Just completed a cataract operation and needed quality sunglasses to keep my new sight in glaring sun. The glasses are high quality, sturdy, optically distortion free and offer U/V protection. Black frames and dark lenses give exactly the 'look' I want. Admits enough light for some indoor use. Great price - the real thing and delivered to my APO address oversea w/o a problem. Buy with confidence.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Horn

customer_reviews.title: Update, frames chipping after 4 months, disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: Just an update from my "great deal on my new raybans!" review from April. About a month ago I noticed a chip in the frame, and now there are two. And the paint on the frame at the top of the lens, where the glasses maybe tough my forehead appears to be rubbing off. It's not terrible (yet) and thankfully in a place nobody will notice for now. But I can only assume these couple small chips will continue to spread. I really thought I'd get a few years out of them. It's not like I wear them everyday. Pretty disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Clark

customer_reviews.title: Iconic Ray-Ban
customer_reviews.text: I bought the RB3025 Aviator Classic Sunglasses, Black/Green, 58 mm. It looks like the 58 mm is the average size--anything with a lower number is designed for smaller faces and anything higher is for larger frame faces. The category and filter type (protection against sun glare) are indicated next to the asterisks above the bar code on the box label. Mine was *3N 3= High protection (These range from 1-5) N=Normal (filter) (There are other filters like P=polarized and F=photochromatic) They are comfortable and light weight. The carrying case and cleaning cloth were included.
customer_reviews.author: T in SF

customer_reviews.title: a little big, i wish they fit tighter
customer_reviews.text: My last Ray-Bans lasted a long time & i still wear them sometimes. I'm glad I got the smaller size, but of course w/the virus i couldn't try them on. I don't regret buying them as they're much darker than my other pair & they look nice but make sure you check the specs to get the best that fit your face
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Love the gold and green
customer_reviews.text: I’m obsessed! I’ve always wanted this color and now I have them. They are not too heavy for having glass lenses either. They are real. Ray ban aviators are my go to sunglasses and I’m so happy that I have another pair!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: False Description
customer_reviews.text: The glasses sent were Ray-Bans but only similar to the description. These were not the glasses advertised. The frame was a plastic turtle shell color with brown lens. Pic attached. Disappointed as these were going to be my vacation glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Talk to
customer_reviews.text: If you’re driving down the highway to the danger zone, these glasses will definitely keep the sun out of your eyes. They’ll help you keep laser focused while outrunning any “bogeys” on your six. Late for your shirtless volleyball montage? Don’t worry. You’ll look great when you get there.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Quality Has Been Maintained Through Time
customer_reviews.text: I was affraid that the sale of Ray Ban by Bausch and Lomb would somehow be detrimental to the sunglasses quality. Those fears proved false. I have used Aviators since my teens and as of today they keep their quality standards unsurpassed. Great purchase. Higly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Joaquin Almanzar

customer_reviews.title: A Classic Look at a Great Price
customer_reviews.text: I've worn Ray-Ban sunglasses dating back to my junior high school days when the original Miami Vice drove me to purchase several pair of Wayfarers. These aviators (black 58mm) are a perfect fit without being oversized and have the quality I've come to expect from Ray--Ban. I prefer the non-polarized for driving and the sturdy case and cleaning cloth it arrived with keep it safe and secure when I travel. These are authentic (I did purchase directly from Amazon rather than a secondary vendor) and I'm very happy with both the purchase price and the quality of product.
customer_reviews.author: Joe G.

customer_reviews.title: The original, the best
customer_reviews.text: There is no topping the original. Lense quality is excellent. Got a great price here online.
customer_reviews.author: Scotsmanbully

customer_reviews.title: Too wide
customer_reviews.text: Loved these glasses - just too wide, they kept falling off my nose and face, even after I adjusted them. They are unisex but maybe not meant for a narrow female face. I am bummed I had to return them I really liked the way they look and feel.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia Susi

customer_reviews.title: A well made classic
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased these glasses for my own use and also been involved in the purchase of many other pairs as gifts for numerous other people. Everyone seems to want them in a hurry so I order them using Prime. The glasses look great in hand and on the face. Within the limits of being made of glass, and thin but strong metal, they seem quite solid. I had a pair that I used for perhaps 5-years and finally wore out a few years ago. About one year ago I purchased this replacement pair. I like the large size because I have a large face. Others have ordered a mix of regular and large sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff SwitzerTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy used, no matter what they say the condition is
customer_reviews.text: Thought I’d snag a real good deal on a used pair; bad choice. The frames were fairly scuffed up and it looks like someone wiped the lens with an abrasive material, showing circular scratches. Save yourself the trouble and buy new
customer_reviews.author: Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Lens Popped Out After Only 2 Weeks
customer_reviews.text: Only had them for a couple of weeks and one of the lens popped out. Tried to fix it and the frame bent so easily that it could not be repaired. Returned them and ordered another pair. Will give them one more try, but not convinced that these are even real Ray Bans. The last pair of real Ray Bans I got 4 years ago are still great, and I have never had a problem with them!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth A. Charak

customer_reviews.title: Did not hold up like Ray-Bans
customer_reviews.text: We ordered these sunglasses for our daughter. We all wear Ray-Bans and have for many years and love their product. This pair of Ray-Bans turned green on the metal and the metal is flaking off. This has never happened before. My daughter thinks that these were not true Ray-Bans. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Mike shenberger

customer_reviews.title: Classic look, great size for female who wants the full size teardrop RB styling.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice fit for my Girlfriend. The 62 mm were a bit too large. Nice packaging and prompt delivery. All the correct markings.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Sunglasses for Grown-Ups
customer_reviews.text: Finally decided it was time to graduate to a real pair of sunglasses. Amazon has the best price I have seen on these authentic shades. These come with the Ray-Ban leather case, cleaning cloth, your sunglasses, and what I'm sure was some very important documentation. The lenses are made of actual glass as opposed to cheapo sunglasses with plastic lenses or film on the outside to provide the tint. The glass is quite resilient... although, I do the best I can not to test them. I bought these about 6 months ago and they are still in flawless shape, just use your case when they are not on your face. A++, I would buy another pair here in a second.
customer_reviews.author: Matt F

customer_reviews.title: Just like the ones I had years ago.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this style sunglasses for years, and they have the same fit and style. The case doesn't seem as protective as older cases, but it looks like there isn't a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Curmudgeon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit and Cool Look
customer_reviews.text: I am a larger human being, and generally have a harder time finding clothes and accessories that fit. I measured my old sunglasses and bought these, and they fit like a dream! They are larger in both lens size and arm length, but if you’re a bigger person, they should fit perfectly! Under a motorcycle helmet, they also fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: ABSOLUTELY love this purchase. Glasses arrived as promised including a nice box & were well cared for. No scratches. No dings. Don't look cheap or like knock offs. Only problem is that they are a little heavy on my face, but oh well! I'll surely purchase more!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Love!
customer_reviews.text: These were exactly what I was looking for. They are lightweight yet durable and does well when I'm out in the sun.
customer_reviews.author: Relle

customer_reviews.title: Timeless classic
customer_reviews.text: Classic aviators, can't go wrong. Fit well, nice detailing as well with some etching in the corner of the lens, in addition to the traditional logo in the upper corner. Does a good job with blocking the sun without being so dark that you can't see to read and such
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Classic for all tastes
customer_reviews.text: You cannot say anything bad about Ray Ban! These are classic and go with all outfits and all seasons.ist buy even if you dont wear gold it's always a nice outfit staple!
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Ray -Ban sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: I am quite sure the glasses could be cheaper when you realize the number of pairs at were made. However, that is what the market demands for that item. I liked what I saw so I paid for them.......
customer_reviews.author: Gerald L Rote

customer_reviews.title: Hmmm...
customer_reviews.text: Cute, cheaply made, bend wayyyy too easily. Trashed after a month. And there ya go ... what a waste.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Non polarized, great  for equipment with LCD displays
customer_reviews.text: Chose this non-polarized sun glasses for a reason since most cockpits and that's including most cars nowadays have LCD display panels. Polarized sunglasses make them hard to read.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Clear View With Ray-Ban From Amazon
customer_reviews.text: A few days ago I received my Ray-Ban, Aviator, Large Metal, RB3025 L0205, Arista/Crystal Green, 58mm Sunglasses. I am very pleased with the improvement with my vision in bright sunlight. The glasses are UVA & B protective with a UV rating of 400. I emailed Ray-Ban to get this information. The glasses are very comfortable and light in weight. I am so pleased that I will shortly be ordering another pair with yellow lenses for use in inclement weather. My recommendation: Don't waste your money on cheap sunglasses. They just don't make the grade. The only fault I find is the side arms could have been a little longer.
customer_reviews.author: Rico

customer_reviews.title: Great looking aviator sunglasses.....definitely ray bans!
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice sunglasses. They have a gold frame and green lenses. Made in Italy and good looking aviators. I have been looking for these to give as a gift. I went to a few sunglass stores and also researched on line. These were definitely the best deal I found. I always look at customer feedback when making purchases. Helps to know exactly what it is you are purchasing. I recommend these if you are looking for ray ban aviator glasses.
customer_reviews.author: janie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: They are genuine Ray Bans what is there to say? I bought mine in 1975 and I still have them. So when my son wanted them, I bought them and Amazon it the best price period. They are indeed genuine. Amazon is an authorized Ray Ban dealer. There are knock offs but if the ones you pick say sold and fulfilled by Amazon they are the real deal. They will last a life time if you don't loose them or do something stupid with them. The best sunglasses ever.
customer_reviews.author: AT

customer_reviews.title: Amazon sent me the wrong size...
customer_reviews.text: The rating would be 5 star, as the product itself was great. Beautiful glasses, really. Would definitely buy again, esp since the price on Amazon is so great. But, Amazon happened to send me the 58mm, even though the order was for 62mm. Luckily, the product fit perfectly. (It was a gift) So, although there was a mix-up, it turned out to be quite fortunate for me, since it saved me the trouble of (probably) having to send it back for another size. So, thanks for that Amazon. I love you guys, but I still have to give you 4 stars out of technicality.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Make sure it says sold by Amazon LLC!
customer_reviews.text: I would definitely recommend this product. This is my second time buying them and at first I was skeptical because I have had bad experiences with fake Ray-Bans. However, if it says sold by Amazon LLC then you are good. Any other seller I wouldn't trust. I have seen some other pics on here and they look pretty sketchy. Read the other reviews of buyers stating that they bought the ones sold by Amazon LLC and you will see I'm right.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I love these glasses. They are super light. They are dark which I like. Arrived right on time. I will be buying another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Saksgirl2002

customer_reviews.title: Love the Lens Color but Delicate Frame
customer_reviews.text: I've had a pair of Ray Ban Aviator's before, but these ones seem to have a little bit more of a delicate frame. After only a week of having these I somehow managed to slightly bend the frame so now they don't sit exactly level on my face. Which no one notices but me, but bothers me. The lens color is awesome. Way better than the online photos. Light blue with a hint of pink. Fit is very comfortable & snug, don't slide around or fall forward on your face when you tilt your head (which my last ones did)
customer_reviews.author: Sovay

customer_reviews.title: Great great sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: This look great, but mostly, these are soo resistant. They have easily fallen to the floor more than 50 times, easilyy. Very durable, I'm always gonna use ray-ban from here on now.
customer_reviews.author: imanol a.

customer_reviews.title: Ray-Ban Quality
customer_reviews.text: Great Ray-Ban quality. The two features I liked most were the glass lenses (versus plastic) which will give long life free from scratches (so long as I'm reasonably careful), and the non-polarized feature (I've never liked the color-spot patterns which show up in the thermally-tempered side windows when I'm inside a car driving). Nothing to complain about. The 62mm size fits perfectly (initially tried the 58mm and returned them for the 62mm's). Color me happy...
customer_reviews.author: Gregory S. Burns

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight perfection
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight and doesn’t touch my face when I smile or whatever. The perfect shades, thanks Ray Ban!
customer_reviews.author: Tottinater

customer_reviews.title: comfortable once (like all similar glasses) properly adjusted
customer_reviews.text: Replacements for a gift that i lost (dangit). They are very lightweight, comfortable once (like all similar glasses) properly adjusted, and do an excellent job of reducing glare. I ride motorcycles, and wear a full face helmet......they fit underneath my helmet very well with no interference. If there is a negative, it's that they are maybe a little darker (one shade?) than they really need to be. But, if i had a choice of having them like they are, or not having them, i'll take them as-is every time. I honestly do not have a complaint with them at all.
customer_reviews.author: Hatch

customer_reviews.title: Love my new Pink Ray Ban!
customer_reviews.text: Althought the description of this sunglasses reads "Red Lens" they are rose or pink. 5 star for the best customer service ever. I was looking for this sunglasses for a long time and not only Gaffos's had them, but they help me get them before my Xmas trip. I was afraid I was not going to get them on time, so I contacted the seller to see if I should pay extra for the rush. Not only they they answer super fast, but they expedite the package at no additional charge... I got them just in time as promise. Love my Ray Ban with Gold Frame/Rose lens... and the best part is the case: RED!
customer_reviews.author: M. Marquez

customer_reviews.title: Amazing glasses, verified to be authentic!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these glasses hoping that I would get the ones with the gold tinted lenses, which are the ones that "001/4F" refers to. I did receive the correct product. Anyway, I was not 100% sure that they were authentic Ray-Bans, but they were verified to be authentic by a sales associate at the store by my house where I normally buy my sunglasses. My guess is that they are refurbished, which although they are not brand-new, they are authentic, and less expensive. Changed my rating from 4 stars to 5.
customer_reviews.author: Jose C.

customer_reviews.title: Great sunglasses, glad they are not polarized
customer_reviews.text: These are great classic and timeless sunglasses that never seem to go out of style and also provide great eye protection. I'm glad they are not polarized because with polarized lenses, you sometimes cannot see instrumentation screens or your iphone screen. I got the 62mm size and at first they seemed really large however I have gotten a lot of compliments on them and have since seen photos of various celebrities with they large ones on as well so they must be cool. I'm quite happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mediahound 🎧

customer_reviews.title: A timeless look that will go great with almost any wardrobe
customer_reviews.text: Timeless, well fitting sunglasses. Not much can be said about them other than whats already been written about here. You've probably seen these worn by countless people - whether walking down the sidewalk or watching a classic film. I just wanted to compliment Amazons price - they are cheaper here than any brick and mortar store I visited, so I recommend picking them up online. The only difficulty is figuring out the fit. There are different sized glasses but its hard to really recommend the right size, I originally bought one that was too small and was able to take advantage of Amazons excellent return policy.
customer_reviews.author: Farquad

customer_reviews.title: They Are Great
customer_reviews.text: I was trying to replace a pair of shades that my son hadn't replaced yet. They were perfect and exactly the pair he had lost.
customer_reviews.author: SoCalWoman

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: Well done UPS! Received my glasses within a week. No cracks or any defects despite sent without any bubble wrappings. These are authentic. I have personally seen replicas before. These have solid frame arms and have RB reflective logo on the inner lens. The wordings on the inner arms are clearly written too. The RB sticker looks somewhat out of place on the lens. Perhaps it is too easy to remove and it slides?
customer_reviews.author: Charle Theodore

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: They're more for women. I got them for mynhusband, and they don't fit well
customer_reviews.author: Bc86

customer_reviews.title: Great sunglasses. True classic
customer_reviews.text: Great sunglasses. True classic. 62mm is for those heads big enough to outwardly stretch the regular 58mm ones. Or if you look funny in the mirror with those smallish 58's... Don't worry about these looking bigger than intended. They'll still look great. Also, they are very easy to adjust (bend) to your head, ears, nose. If not feeling confident, go to a lens vendor in any mall and have them adjusted. They usually don't charge a dime for that. Also, if unsure about size/style, please go to a mall and try them on. Be sure to note the size and color scheme...then come back and order. Easy.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Caballero

customer_reviews.title: Very good thing I think.
customer_reviews.text: It's real genius. It is just item that I think. Excellent quality and rigid body all is satisfied to me.
customer_reviews.author: RHO HYUNG JOON

customer_reviews.title: We shall see..
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had them for a week. So far, so good. Hopefully they are authentic and hold up well. Shipped and sold from Amazon, so they are “supposed” to be authentic. They feature all got he markings, that I am aware of anyway. Lenses seem to be glass, as opposed to plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsi

customer_reviews.title: Great deal at amazon warehouse!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these ray-bans from the amazon warehouse. They were about 1/3rd the cost of new ones from ray-ban. The first pair had a couple minor chips in the right lens and I debated keeping them. But I sent them back, free of charge, and the next pair are perfect! Great deal!
customer_reviews.author: Tom Clark

customer_reviews.title: They feel real
customer_reviews.text: I've owned numerous pairs of glasses, and these are by far the best. They feel real and sturdy. They're really comfortable to wear and they arent heavy. Definitely worth the money
customer_reviews.author: cory huling

customer_reviews.title: Great sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: My 2nd pair of Ray-Bans and I love them. I've had my 1st pair for 35+ years and they still look good.
customer_reviews.author: Ted D. Whitfield

customer_reviews.title: I really enjoyed these sun glasses however I was rally hesitant in ...
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoyed these sun glasses however I was rally hesitant in keeping them because the frame were so small I had to get used to seeing myself with such a small frame. So warning the frame looks like a child size.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Garcia

customer_reviews.title: #1 Stunna
customer_reviews.text: Yo, these shades make me look cool as hell. I put them on, and suddenly I'm transported to an F-16, dudes call me Maverick, and I'm putting my best friend's life in danger! It's a time machine for your face.
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana M.

customer_reviews.title: great looking Aviator Classic Sunglass
customer_reviews.text: great looks, great size, very well made, just great overall glasses
customer_reviews.author: nash f tanagho

customer_reviews.title: great glasses
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair in 20 years. I still have the first pair but have scratched the lenses. Best glasses out there.
customer_reviews.author: Larry W

customer_reviews.title: Look good, fit right and hold up under daily use
customer_reviews.text: Always in my car and do just what sunglasses need to do. Driving over 8 hours the weight of the glasses will get heavy on the nose.
customer_reviews.author: Earl I.

customer_reviews.title: Too small for me
customer_reviews.text: I thought these were great when I first got them, but I had a problem with glare on the sides when I was driving. I think the problem is that they weren't wide enough for my face.
customer_reviews.author: Speed

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Love these Ray Ban sunglasses. I originally purchased the 58mm, but returned them because they were too big. I have a narrow face so the 55mm look best on me. From everything I've read about Ray Bans, these are authentic. They are heavy, well made, and have the RB engraved on the left lense.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: And the good news is that the Ray-Ban logo on the lens ...
customer_reviews.text: Little doubt these (Italian) are the real thing. I've bought this aviator style for 30 years and side by side comparison with those purchased in the 90's convinces me. And the good news is that the Ray-Ban logo on the lens is easily removed with a sharp razor blade. I'd feared this was etched in the glass, compromising the optics, but not so. Good service from Blinq.
customer_reviews.author: mazer r

customer_reviews.title: Wrong item
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this item twice and was given the wrong item both times. Sad because it’s such a beautiful pair of shades and i was really looking forward to them.
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: Lots of compliments
customer_reviews.text: I love these glasses. They are not a dark lens, so if you're looking for something that will work in very bright sun, these are not a good choice. I wanted something for dimmer conditions and I couldn't be happier with this choice. They look great on - you can't really go wrong with a large sized aviator - and I get lots of compliments on the mirrored lens. A great modern look aviator at a great price from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: Legit,  just like Ray-Ban of the past.
customer_reviews.text: i had bought some Ray-Bans sunglasses on ANOTHER site and was so disappointed so returned them. But decided to give Amzon a try and glad i did . These felt sturdy well made and looked great. Made in Italy
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Love these sunglasses!
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing these glasses for almost a month and absolutely love them. I am a petite female with an oval shaped face and the 55mm frames fit me perfectly. They do feel a little delicate which makes me worried about bending them or breaking them but this also makes them very lightweight on my face. Despite feeling delicate they feel very secure on my face. I'm glad I purchased these.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper123

customer_reviews.title: Classic sunglasses for a great Price
customer_reviews.text: We have two pair of these type of sunglasses now and the only bad thing I can say is that each pair fits a little differently.
customer_reviews.author: Electrical Superintendent

customer_reviews.title: Real deal Ray-Bans
customer_reviews.text: Very nice real Ray-Ban sunglasses. No fake stuff here. Always loved Ray bans lenses, they are the best.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. I've always loved aviators and have owned many cheap pairs, but I finally decided that I needed to invest in quality shades that would last. I'd been eyeing these for a while and I'm so glad I went for it! This is my new favorite - looks and feels great, love the G 15 lenses (really great in the sun), and I'm very happy with this decision.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: My HolyGrail Sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: These are classics. They are timeless and my go-to pair of sunglasses. They are appropriately priced, especially for their quality, but also for their added longevity in the world of style (they are ALWAYS in!). These look amazing on the face. I never see anyone sporting them that they look odd on. Just get the right size for your face and you should be good to go. I love these like none other.
customer_reviews.author: Liv

customer_reviews.title: NOT Polarized.
customer_reviews.text: While I do like these sunglasses, they are NOT polarized as advertised in the listing. Will be returning. They are G-15 lenses.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Original with a good price!
customer_reviews.text: Just Love it! 100% original! If you look for videos on youtube that show you the indicators of original RayBan, you will find all of them on this sunglasses. Very good quality and arrived earlier than expected. I would like to recommend to everyone that want to buy good aviator sunglasses to buy from Luxottica!
customer_reviews.author: GiOlive

customer_reviews.title: Ray Ban Aviator Sunglasses [RB3025] - gold frame/photo yellow GSM lens-58 mm
customer_reviews.text: Because I had a choice of lens sizes, I almost got a custom fit. I am outdoors often and my eyes are a little light sensitive, so this type of lens tint is ideal to relieve eye strain. Also, the glasses are lighter than I expected. Came with their signature case w/lens cloth set. I'm prejudiced - Ray Ban has been my sunglass brand of choice since I was a kid and I'm STILL very impressed with their product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Charles K. Warren

customer_reviews.title: Ray Ban Aviator Classics are the very best!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of Ray Ban Aviator Classic sunglasses. My first pair set the standard. They were bought back in the 1980s and lasted me incredibly well. I wore them everywhere while I was still on active duty in the Army. After I retired they were always there for annual summer vacations to Orlando, etc.. I hope that these will give me such great service as the last pair did. I totally recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Maurice K. Allgeier Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Package was crushed. Try a sturdy box next time!
customer_reviews.text: Am so disappointed that my order came smashed,crushed and this being glasses it was a disaster. This isn't the first time m y packages have come this way. This package tracked all over the country and was several days late. There was even shoe tracks on package!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product and fast delivery!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, these came extremely quickly and are legit Ray Bans! At first I suspected they might be fake given how good the price was, but I compared mine with a friends and they are definitely real! They came with a case and cleaning cloth and are absolutely perfect. I did debate getting a smaller pair, but the 58mm is just right. The hinges are a little tough, but I think with more wear they will be easier to move. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: EGB

customer_reviews.title: Great DEAL
customer_reviews.text: I LOVED the black frame aviators I purchased. They are definitely real so the price was a great deal. I would have preferred for the packaging of the ray bans to not have so many price stickers all over it since I'm giving it as a gift but i guess what counts is what is one the inside which are the glasses themselves.
customer_reviews.author: Eleane C

customer_reviews.title: very nice
customer_reviews.text: These were a christmas present for my fiancé. They were absolutely perfect and he loved them. They were made well and scratch proof. My son already tried that one out, much to my fiancé's dismay. He got worried that they were scratched and nope they were not. Thank goodness, because he loves them. They fit well and look great. Thank you so much for your quick shipment.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Meas

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Gift for my Boyfriend
customer_reviews.text: He lost his pair one night, so I decided to replace them. (Gold Frame/Crystal Green G-15XLT Lens) - they are just so good-lookin' on him! And for the price, pretty great deal for Ray-Bans. He has very sharp features and a chisled jaw, so these things look just amazing on him. I have a much rounder/moon face, and I would not suggest these for people like me haha.
customer_reviews.author: LpDoubled

customer_reviews.title: Love Them - That Is All
customer_reviews.text: They're aviators; if you don't know what they look like by now, I assume you just landed. They're well balanced, of solid build, and they have a timeless look. They're mirrored, but not so much that you look as though you belong in a USA Network series or maybe on Jersey Shore. It's still possible for another person to see through your lenses to your eyes, but only if you're positioned just right, there's a light source behind you, etc. They end up having a smoky, rather than harsh, look to the mirrors. They're Ray-Bans - there are no other aviators.
customer_reviews.author: Mark J. Love

customer_reviews.title: Great product,great price,fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: Just about the best deal around for a very nice product. Quality, as usual, is top and size is perfect.These are the real deal. I've noticed some of these reviews indicate they have purchased fakes. You must be careful and make sure that what you are purchasing is marketed and sold by Amazon only. If this is the case then you know you're ok as they are the safest buy around. I've never had any doubt about the authenticity of any purchase that I've made from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Spade

customer_reviews.title: Classic style
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a Christmas present for my daughter. She loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Fuller-Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Not polarized
customer_reviews.text: They are nice sunglasses. However, they are not polarized as the description says.
customer_reviews.author: David Jeansonne

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of sunglasses from seller!!
customer_reviews.text: These are great!! I probably should have ordered a larger pair, but they still fit and look great on me.
customer_reviews.author: Sonia Wysingle

customer_reviews.title: Love them and really love the price which saved me ...
customer_reviews.text: Love them and really love the price which saved me $60 over the price at the mall. This is my third pair and I have a suggestion when ordering from Amazon Prime. First visit a store such as Sunglass Hut and try on a variety of styles so you are certain to be happy with the size and color.
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: MADE IN ITALY... Lo adoro!
customer_reviews.text: One Word....Perfetto!! I already have the silver with mirrored lens which I love and get loads of compliment. But wanted to go Completa Retro Aviator, so this time I got the Gold Frame with Crystal Green G-15xlt lens which of course are Stunning! I went with 58mm wich is perfect fit for guys.."my type" ;) Not too big or small.. I'm 6'2" athletic built and these are perfect fit for my face.
customer_reviews.author: TOP GUN

customer_reviews.title: Quality shades
customer_reviews.text: I lost my original pair of aviators and couldn't seem to find an identical pair online. These "Ray-Ban RB3025 Aviator Large Metal Non-Polarized Sunglasses" work great, and are pretty inexpensive compared to other Ray-Ban outlets and products. I'd recommend them if you're willing to risk buying sunglasses online (and not fitting correctly, etc.).
customer_reviews.author: kelpster

customer_reviews.title: Great driving glass -- by far the best I've had ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been waiting for RayBan to bring back the Ambermatic Lens, but this is 90% of what the Ambermatic was and it is in a size that fits my head. Great driving glass -- by far the best I've had in years. Trumps anything from Maui Jim (which are better for fishing). Nice to back in RayBans.
customer_reviews.author: W. Calvin Morris

customer_reviews.title: My favorite sunglasses by far
customer_reviews.text: Mine are authentic! Came with all original paperwork, case and the frames have all the etching, as well as the inside lens etching that is hard to notice. My favorite sunglasses by far. I also have the gold/green lenses that I also got from amazon, I doubted their authenticity but I believe now comparing that they're both authentic
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Excellent lenses
customer_reviews.text: These glasses have optically perfect lenses that is an important selling factor for me. The size is perfect for my face and the style is classic. They are, however, a little sloppy. If I bend over or turn quickly, they have a tendency to slip off. A trip to the optometrist this month may cure that issue. Overall, a fantastic pair of glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Voice Over

customer_reviews.title: Great glasses for everything but bright days
customer_reviews.text: These aren't my first pair, so I knew what to expect. They are quality sunglasses, but are a little light when it comes to the lenses. If you're out on a sunny day, you may find yourself looking for something darker. These are great for those annoying overcast days when you're always squinting.
customer_reviews.author: Brian P. Green

customer_reviews.title: I love these glasses
customer_reviews.text: I love these glasses! I'm not sure why people say they are fake. They're not! They came in the original box including a case and microfiber lens cleaner. The length around the ears to the nose was long for me but I took them to the optometrist and they adjusted them for me. Happy birthday to me!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Camps

customer_reviews.title: Now I can see the HUD information!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these ones to be able to use a HUD and it worked perfectly. Reason is because they are not polarized.
customer_reviews.author: catzelp

customer_reviews.title: Love these glasses!
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited when I saw these glasses on Amazon. I wish I would have found them 3 weeks earlier before I purchased the aviators from Oakley. I love them. They fit great they look great and I appreciate the price. It is so much easier to see while fishing and driving thanks to the polarization. I would definitely recommend these to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my adult son for his birthday and he loves them. Guess that's why he put them on his Amazon wish list. And, well, when he isn't wearing them, his wife wears them, so they are definitely getting used. As far as I know, they work well. I've heard no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Dellyn

customer_reviews.title: One of the Best Sunglasses Ever Bought.
customer_reviews.text: I got the right size by measuring by current Polo sunglasses. Weight is just right and really looks great on the shape of my face. After examining all the details on this Ray-Ban and watching YouTube...it is an original item. Make sure to check the measurement of the glasses before buying to make sure it is a right fit.
customer_reviews.author: juroq65

customer_reviews.title: I am very pleased. Ordered these for my teenage son
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly. Sunglasses had finger prints on lenses so they had been handled outside the packaging but I don't notice any defects. The product registration card was absent. The seller's info mentions they warranty the watches but I don't know how that applies to the sunglasses. Overall, I am very pleased. Ordered these for my teenage son... his first good sunglasses so the price was much better than direct or a local shop. He loves the sunglasses. His face is slender so the 55 mm fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fakes!
customer_reviews.text: These Ray Bans are fakes. I'm sure it's illegal to call these real. They're not authentic despite their packaging. The engraving on the lens, which is usually an indication of authentic Ray Bans is in the wrong spot and the lenses actually chip and dent because they're made of such cheap plastic. I have had many real Ray Bans and other, high end sunglasses that are in better condition after years of wear. After 4 months of wearing, these are almost unwearable now.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Bos

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: A real quality pair of sunglasses—mine are charcoal grey. No wonder Ray Ban stays on top!
customer_reviews.author: Sailor 331

customer_reviews.title: Ray ban won’t go wrong
customer_reviews.text: Ray ban cant go wrong. Suggest that you check the size that fits you at a mall or a glasses store before purchasing online. Great quality!
customer_reviews.author: My review:

product_meta.title: Ray-Ban Rb3025 Aviator Classic Sunglasses
product_meta.description:
Originally designed for U.S. aviators in 1937, Ray-Ban RB3025 Aviator sunglasses have quickly become one of the most iconic sunglasses models in the world. These perfect Ray-Ban Aviators for women and men are a timeless model that combines great aviator styling with exceptional quality, performance, and comfort. Aviator sunglasses by Ray-Ban are comfortable unisex glasses that are offered in multiple frame- and lens-color options. 

The updated Ray-Ban aviator sunglasses feature the Ray-Ban Evolve photochromatic lenses. The Evolve photochromatic lens treatment allows a gradual change of lens color from a lighter shade to a darker shade within three minutes when exposed to UV light outdoors. No other light will result in the color change. Within five minutes of stepping back inside, the Evolve lenses in the RB3025 will gradually change back to the original color! Made from high-quality glass, Ray-Ban lenses are prescription ready.

Made famous by the 1980s movie Top Gun and others, these Ray-Ban sunglasses for women and men are known for elegant wire frames that are durable and built to last. With a classic metal frame, you can see the world through a variety of lens colors including crystal brown, crystal green, G-15 non-polarized, and more—all of which provide optimal visual clarity and 100% UV protection. G-15 lenses absorb 85% of visible light and block out most blue light. They provide amazing color contrast and produce better clarity and more natural vision. These sunglasses for women and men are comfortable to wear and make a statement anywhere you wear them. To keep them clean, we’ve included a lens cloth in the case.

Ray-Ban is the world’s most iconic eyewear brand and is a global leader in its sector. Every model in the Ray-Ban collection is the product of meticulous, original styling that translates the best of the latest fashion trends into an ever-contemporary look for millions of Ray-Ban wearers around the world. From the early Aviator style that emerged in 1937 to the introduction of the classic Wayfarer in 1952, Ray-Ban is a brand that embodies America, adventure, great cities, wide-open spaces, heroism, individuality, and authenticity.
feature_bullets: Metal aviators featuring prescription-ready lenses with "RB" etched on left lens
The shape and curvature of these sunglasses may need adjustments. Adjustments should only be made by a professional.
